snippet: German women were among the strongest supporters of Nazi nationalism and the party's racist ideals, so why is it so shocking to see young women involved in today's neo-Nazi movement?
abstract: German women were among the strongest supporters of Nazi nationalism and the party's racist ideals, so why is it so shocking to see young women involved in today's neo-Nazi movement?
lead_paragraph: BERLIN - A recent film and a high-profile arrest in Germany have caused many here to take a closer look at a small, but growing, female contingent of far-right extremists.

headline.main: Taking a Second Look at Today's 'Nazi Brides'
